passive.name: One At A Time
passive.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> and their follow-up attacks' DMG by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, apply the Tame state to the target, stacking up to {{4}} stacks. When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, every Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>.
